bug.short_desc: Share context menu item should be below "Search..." menu item

assigned_to.name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

long_desc.thetext:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.2a1pre) Gecko/20110403 Firefox/4.2a1pre Build Identifier:
The context menu share option should be below search and not above. Users are more likely to share than search and would've gotten used to the current search placement in the context menu.
Reproducible: Always

Note that the integrated sharing code does not currently implement the context menu from the F1 add-on and it's unclear at this point whether it ever will. So this bug is almost INVALID. Or did you mean to file against the F1 add-on? (That's in the Mozilla Labs bugzilla product.)
